key.name: ignore-sticky
key.summary: Ignore sticky windows in the calculations
key.description: Treat sticky windows as non-existant when calculating space to use for the maximumize window.

key.name: ignore-overlapping
key.summary: Ignore already overlapping windows in the calculations
key.description: Treat windows that are already overlapping with the current window as non-existant when calculating space to use for the maximumize window.

key.name: allow-shrink
key.summary: Permit windows to shrink during maximumize
key.description: This allows a window to change it's shape to fit in an area even when the new shape might be smaller than it's current size with regards to area

key.name: maximumize-left
key.description: When maximumizing, allow the window to grow to the left.

key.name: maximumize-right
key.description: When maximumizing, allow the window to grow to the right.

key.name: maximumize-up
key.description: When maximumizing, allow the window to grow upwards.

key.name: maximumize-down
key.description: When maximumizing, allow the window to grow downwards.

key.name: trigger-max-key
key.description: Trigger a resize of the window currently focused so it fits as much of the available screenspae as possible.

key.name: trigger-max-left
key.description: Grow the window leftwards as much as possible.

key.name: trigger-max-right
key.description: Grow the window rightwards as much as possible.

key.name: trigger-max-up
key.description: Grow the window upwards as much as possible.

key.name: trigger-max-down
key.description: Grow the window downwards as much as possible.

key.name: trigger-max-horizontally
key.description: Grow the window horizontally as much as possible.

key.name: trigger-max-vertically
key.description: Grow the window vertically as much as possible.

key.name: trigger-max-up-left
key.description: Grow upper left corner of a window as much as possible.

key.name: trigger-max-up-right
key.description: Grow upper right corner of a window as much as possible.

key.name: trigger-max-down-left
key.description: Grow lower left corner of a window as much as possible.

key.name: trigger-max-down-right
key.description: Grow lower right corner of a window as much as possible.

key.name: trigger-min-key
key.description: Trigger a resize of the window currently focused so it resizes to 1/4 size.

key.name: trigger-min-left
key.description: Shrink the window leftwards.

key.name: trigger-min-right
key.description: Shrink the window rightwards.

key.name: trigger-min-up
key.description: Shrink the window upwards.

key.name: trigger-min-down
key.description: Shrink the window downwards.

key.name: trigger-min-horizontally
key.description: Shrink the window horizontally.

key.name: trigger-min-vertically
key.description: Shrink the window vertically.

key.name: trigger-min-up-left
key.description: Shrink upper left corner of a the window.

key.name: trigger-min-up-right
key.description: Shrink upper right corner of a the window.

key.name: trigger-min-down-left
key.description: Shrink lower left corner of a the window.

key.name: trigger-min-down-right
key.description: Shrink lower right corner of a the window.
